events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster with a focus on software development roles.
A recruiter specialized in engineering positions has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was successfully completed, discussing the candidate's experience in software development and devops.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the next stage of the technical interview.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the candidate to assess their software engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating strong coding skills and system design knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled to further discuss the candidate's cultural fit and benefits expectations.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's communication skills and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including a competitive salary package and additional benefits.
The candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate has accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment to start onboarding as soon as possible.
The onboarding process has officially started, with the candidate completing initial documentation and orientation sessions.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
